• Lab: 01 Hello World
  1. Make sure 01-hello-world.html runs and renders in the browser.
  2. Create a node under the body called <div id='container'> and render the output there.
  3. Past the following under body and render to the third item on the list (you don't need it, but if you want to use jquery, you can add <script src='https://code.jquery.com/jquery-2.1.1.min.js' type='text/javascript><script>). MDN CSS Reference
<div>
    <p class='first'></p>
    <p class='second'></p>
    <p class='third'></p>
</div>
